name: Pico Snake
description:
Pico Snake is the first game I made using the Pico8 console. In case you don't know the rules, you only have to guide the snake to the fruits so that he can eat and get longer, but you can't bite your own body or you will lose ! The more fruits you eat, the more the game will be fast and hard.

Use the arrows to move, X to play or replay, C to get back to menu. You can also mute the game using Ctrl+M if needed !

Hope you'll like it !
